Video Caption: The Grand Gathering EP1 | Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics Opening Ceremony Preparatory Documentary
Comment: Now I know why it is hard to be a movie director....

Video Caption: The Grand Gathering EP1 | Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics Opening Ceremony Preparatory Documentary
Comment: 比起08的史诗感，这次开幕式更让我感动。08像是为中国的历史呐喊，冬奥却是在表达中国文化的内涵，宣告中国式的未来，向往，未来，科技，浪漫，和同，友善，自信。老谋子真的厉害，人家是后浪推前浪，他是前浪变后浪，越来越浪。
